word list.definition: a restraint upon the activities or communication of persons or the transport of goods designed to prevent the spread of disease or pests
word list.example sentence: These coronavirus self-help guides offer tips on how to maintain mental health and relationships under quarantine.

word list.definition: a set of materials or equipment designed for a particular use
word list.example sentence: Chapman said the rocket appeared to rub against the launch apparatus, which could have torn the parachutes.

word list.definition: an optical effect that is sometimes seen at sea, in the desert, or over a hot pavement, that may have the appearance of a pool of water or a mirror in which distant objects are seen inverted, and that is caused by the bending or reflection of rays of light by a layer of heated air of varying density
word list.example sentence: The sailor was overjoyed when he realized what he thought was a mirage was an actual island.

word list.definition: open, subject, or unresistant to some stimulus, influence, or agency
word list.example sentence: Some people are more susceptible to depression during the winter because of reduced exposure to sunlight.

word list.definition: marked by or exhibiting a fawning attentiveness
word list.example sentence: She's constantly followed by obsequious assistants who will do anything she tells them to.

word list.definition: not simultaneous or concurrent in time
word list.example sentence: Not only have audiences fragmented across a larger range of TV shows and platforms, but most of their viewing is asynchronous and private.

word list.definition: marked by, held in, or conducted with secrecy
word list.example sentence: I took a clandestine peek at the price tag on the diamond necklace.

word list.definition: the process of preparing an instructional program for a device (such as a computer)
word list.example sentence: The news conference interrupted regular television programming.

word list.definition: the faculty or phenomenon of finding valuable or agreeable things not sought for
word list.example sentence: They found each other by pure serendipity.

word list.definition: the act of making an indirect reference to something
